Text:
Spetses - if you were to do a checksum on both files; one being this one and one more being the original sold copy; you would see that both files are exactly identical. Both files also clock in at exactly 51,968,830 bytes.

I'm not sure about the lack of metadata; but the exact same copy I nabbed off the Autosport servers is the exact same copy I uploaded. In fact I just downloaded the pdf file off this torrent again and I see content creator; and encoding software; as Acrobat 9.5.0. I also did a fresh download of the official Autosport copy, and it lists the creator and encoder as Acrobat 9.5.0 as well.
